channel.title: Skill Cape Masters
channel.description:
Well i have skill masters (good ones) and i want to make it so lets say the magic skillcape master. I want to make him into a shop that you need 99 magic to view the shop. What do i have to add to make it that way?
I will give you credits if you help me with this
edit: you can pm me if you want

item.title: Skill Cape Masters
item.dc:creator: @WrittenBlade WrittenBlade
item.description:
@WrittenBlade wrote:

		[code]if (NPCID == 461 && playerLevel[X] >= 99) {
			PutNPCCoords = true;
			WanneShop = A;
		} else if (NPCID == 461 && playerLevel[X] < 99) {
			PutNPCCoords = true;
			WanneShop = B;
		}[/code]

Read full topic
